title: Ticket #273: Allow attributes to be unset with condor_qedit
description:
This is part of the large patch set contributed by Dan Forrest.

According to my notes, this currently can be done for a single job but not for an entire cluster or by constraint. Dan most specifically needed this capability to unset the LastCkptServer attribute in order to force stduniv jobs to restart from scratch. His patch both enables deleting attributes via qedit and causes setting LastCkptServer to the empty string to be functionally equivalent to unsetting it (a change that he had made earlier as a workaround).

Chunks from the annotated diff of Dan's changes (which Todd has) that are associated with this ticket are labeled with a (17).
